Player History
Injured on 6/27/1969 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Drafted in 5th round, 99th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1976...
Injured on 4/6/1982 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (N) on 7/7/1982 (Going to CHC: P R. Davis. Going to NYY: P B. Castro, P M. Garman)...
Released by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1984...
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Boston in 1985...
Injured on 5/21/1987 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/8/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1991, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1991, going 3-1, 0.80...
Injured on 9/4/1991 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
